menu.title: Legal & Policies
menu.privacyDescription: How we collect, use, and protect your data
menu.refundDescription: Our policies on returns and refunds
menu.deliveryDescription: How we deliver our digital services
menu.termsDescription: Rules and guidelines for using our platform

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At ClipStream, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and services.

personalInformation.title: Personal Information
personalInformation.paymentInfo: Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)

contentAndUsageData.title: Content and Usage Data
contentAndUsageData.videos: Videos and content you upload or create

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.improveExperience: Improve user experience and personalize content
howWeUse.communicate: Communicate with you about updates and offers
howWeUse.ensureSafety: Ensure platform safety and prevent fraud

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with:
informationSharing.serviceProviders: Service Providers: Payment processors, cloud storage, analytics
informationSharing.legalRequirements: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect rights
informationSharing.businessTransfers: Business Transfers: In case of merger or acquisition
informationSharing.withConsent: With Your Consent: When you explicitly agree to sharing

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our service is not intended for users under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

digitalProductsPolicy.title: Digital Products Policy
digitalProductsPolicy.content: As a digital service platform, most purchases are final upon delivery of services or digital goods. However, we understand issues may arise.

refundEligibility.title: Refund Eligibility
refundEligibility.paymentErrors: Payment processing errors or duplicate charges

nonRefundable.title: Non-Refundable
nonRefundable.changeOfMind: Change of mind after successful purchase

refundRequestProcess.title: Refund Request Process
refundRequestProcess.step1Content: Contact support within 7 days of purchase via email or in-app support
refundRequestProcess.step2Content: Include transaction ID, purchase date, and reason for refund
refundRequestProcess.step3Content: We review requests within 3-5 business days
refundRequestProcess.step4Content: Approved refunds processed within 7-10 business days

refundMethods.title: Refund Methods
refundMethods.usdtCrypto: USDT/Crypto: Refunded to original wallet address
refundMethods.bankTransfer: Bank Transfer: Refunded to original account
refundMethods.creditDebitCard: Credit/Debit Card: Refunded to original card
refundMethods.note: Processing time varies by payment method and financial institution.

disputesAndChargebacks.title: Disputes & Chargebacks
disputesAndChargebacks.content: Initiating a chargeback without contacting us first may result in account suspension. Please reach out to resolve issues before disputing charges.

digitalServiceDelivery.title: Digital Service Delivery
digitalServiceDelivery.content: ClipStream provides digital services and virtual products. There is no physical shipping involved. All services are delivered electronically.

pointsAndVirtualCurrency.title: Points & Virtual Currency
pointsAndVirtualCurrency.instantDeliveryNote: Points are credited to your account immediately upon successful payment verification.

premiumFeatures.title: Premium Features
premiumFeatures.content: Premium features and subscriptions are activated immediately upon successful payment. Access remains active for the purchased duration.

deliveryIssues.title: Delivery Issues
deliveryIssues.intro: If you experience delays in receiving points or services, please:
deliveryIssues.checkHistory: Check your transaction history in the app
deliveryIssues.contactSupport: Contact support if issue persists beyond stated timeframe

failedDeliveries.title: Failed Deliveries
failedDeliveries.intro: In rare cases where delivery fails due to technical issues:
failedDeliveries.notified: You'll be notified of any issues
failedDeliveries.refundProcessed: Refund will be processed if delivery cannot be completed
failedDeliveries.noCharges: No charges for failed delivery attempts

platformAccess.title: 24/7 Platform Access
platformAccess.content: Our platform operates continuously with occasional maintenance windows.

scheduledMaintenance.title: Scheduled Maintenance
scheduledMaintenance.announced: Announced in advance via app notifications

geographicAvailability.title: Geographic Availability
geographicAvailability.content: Our services are available globally, subject to local regulations. Some features may be restricted in certain regions due to legal requirements.

agreementToTerms.title: Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.content: By accessing or using ClipStream, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the service.

accountCreation.title: Account Creation
accountCreation.ageRequirement: You must be at least 13 years old to create an account
accountCreation.maintainSecurity: Maintain security of your account credentials

accountResponsibilities.title: Account Responsibilities
accountResponsibilities.responsibleForActivities: You are responsible for all activities under your account
accountResponsibilities.notifyUnauthorized: Notify us immediately of unauthorized access
accountResponsibilities.doNotShare: Do not share your account with others
accountResponsibilities.keepUpdated: Keep your email and contact information updated

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.warning: Users must not engage in prohibited activities that violate our community guidelines.

prohibitedActivities.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.impersonating: Impersonating others or creating fake accounts

yourContent.title: Your Content
yourContent.retainOwnership: You retain ownership of content you upload
yourContent.grantLicense: You grant us license to use, display, and distribute your content
yourContent.haveRights: You represent that you have rights to all uploaded content
yourContent.responsible: You are responsible for your content and its consequences

ourRights.title: Our Rights
ourRights.removeContent: We may remove content that violates these terms
ourRights.moderateContent: We reserve right to moderate all content
ourRights.ownFeatures: We own all platform features and functionality
ourRights.trademarks: Our trademarks and branding are protected

pointsAndVirtualCurrency.title: Points & Virtual Currency
pointsAndVirtualCurrency.noCashValue: Points have no real-world cash value
pointsAndVirtualCurrency.cannotTransfer: Points cannot be transferred between users
pointsAndVirtualCurrency.cannotExchange: Points cannot be exchanged for cash
pointsAndVirtualCurrency.mayExpire: Unused points may expire per our policy
pointsAndVirtualCurrency.adjustValues: We may adjust point values with notice

paymentsAndBilling.title: Payments & Billing
paymentsAndBilling.pricesInUSD: All prices are in USD unless stated otherwise
paymentsAndBilling.secureProcessing: Payments are processed securely through third parties
paymentsAndBilling.authorizeCharges: You authorize charges for selected services
paymentsAndBilling.refundPolicy: Refunds are subject to our refund policy
paymentsAndBilling.changePricing: We reserve right to change pricing with notice

byYou.title: By You
byYou.content: You may delete your account at any time through account settings.

byUs.title: By Us
byUs.content: We may suspend or terminate accounts for:

effectsOfTermination.title: Effects of Termination
effectsOfTermination.accessLost: Access to account and content will be lost
effectsOfTermination.contentRemoved: Content may be removed from platform
effectsOfTermination.provisionsSurvive: Certain provisions of terms will survive termination

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: We provide the service without warranties of any kind. We don't guarantee uninterrupted, secure, or error-free service. Use at your own risk.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, ClipStream shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use the service.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold ClipStream harmless from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses arising from your use of the service or violation of these terms.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of new terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where ClipStream is registered, without regard to conflict of law provisions.

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.contactFirst: Contact us first to resolve disputes informally
disputeResolution.arbitration: Arbitration may be required for unresolved disputes

common.supportHours: Support hours: Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM EST

login.tagline: Stream, shop, and connect in the most futuristic live platform.

signup.tagline: Stream, shop, and connect in the most futuristic live platform.
signup.byCreatingAccount: By creating an account, you agree to our
